name: Terminal Voltage
description:
Ah, the days were simple. Show up to work, provide power to the neighboring cities and eat donuts to your hearts content. Management always jabbering about "The Next Big Thing." Little did you realize, management was referring to an ALIEN ARTIFACT.

Now, they want it back.

Defend the facility at all costs! We've already laid the ground work, so place some Pylons and route the power.

It would be a real bummer if Timmy misses his Sunday morning cartoons!

If you want to fix it you have the source code to do it yourself.

Controls

Shift - Attach Power Lines from/to Pylons & Towers.

Left Click - Select

Right Click - Remove Pylon
